TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_N-li-ke_Fei-m, title = N-li-ke_Fei-m, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/N-li-ke_Fei-m} }

S.FORM: == N-li-ke. Fei-m 恩里科·費米 == sumamad早年 N-li-ke. Fei-mi itida i caysiw sepcay mihcaan siwa a bulat tusiw a mihcaan ni lecuhan i Luo-ma. ci ama nida ci A-e-pey-tuo. Fei-mi u Yi-ta-li nu dadan nu silamalay a mikuwanay, uyna ci Yi-ta. De-cei-ti-se u saydan nu mulaay. sakatulu nu wawaan, u kakana ci Ma-li-ya mikikaka tu tusaay a mihcaan, kakama ci Cu-li-aw mikikaka ci nidaan tu cacay a mihcaan. lecuh sa ku nu heni a tatusa malekaka pataydan tu i pahabayay ci nidaan. tusaay nu pangkiwan taluma ci N-li-ke. Pipalutatengaan nu heni u tinsukiw, ci N-li-ke lecuhan singlian tu ci nida, nika ci nida atu wina wama nida nai' ku tatiedan, sisa tu nikaudip nida palutatengan nida u puke-celun. ci N-li-ke atu ci kakama nida malecad ku kanawlan nu heni yu wawa henay, malecad ku nu heni misangan tu muta, misalama tu nu dingkiay mitiyungay atu nu kikay a sasalamaan. caysiw caulim mihcaan, ci Cu-li-ya kasibenaan nu takulaw pisizicuan a pimacuyan sa mapatay. . itini i Luo-ma a pacakayan tu baluan, ci Fai-mi macakay nida ku cacayany a cudadan " susyewuli a cudadan" uyniyan nu cudadan sakawuli a pakatinengay cinidaan. ina cudadan tu siwa a lasubuan a belihan namaka Yesuhu ci An-de-le. Ka-la-fa-senpu i caywal-sipsep mihcaan u latingu a nisulitan. ci Ka-la-fa-senpu u Luo-ma cacudadan a saydan, nina cudadan masulit tu nu tawyaay a katinengan a sasausian, kutin-lisye, tinwen-sye ,kun-sye at usen-sye a sakatinengan. ci Fai-mi malecaday ku namuh nuheni ci N-like. Puo-sike masasungaay ku nuheni tatusa. kaput nu wama ni Fai-mi mikuli ci A-taw-fu.A-mi-tay-yi paicelang ci Fai-mian minanam tu wu'li, napasinubu tu cinida tu pinaay nu wuli atu susya a cudadan, uyniyan a cudadan tada manamuh tu ci Fai-mi. . Pi-sa nikaudip比薩生涯 caysiw caywal mihcaan pitu a bulat, Fei-mi mihedek micudad. u sapatideng atu sapasubana a sakapahay, ci A-mi-tay-yi paicelang ci Fei-miyan misinsin tu Pi-sa tabakiay a sihanggakuan. adada henay ku balucu' ni laliwan nu wawaan caay ka ngadah tu cinidaan miliyas tu luma' tayda i Pi-sa micudad, mangalay papicudad cinidaan i Luo-ma tabakiay a cacudadan, nika sadikuday mahangen tu. cacudadan mangalay pakaytini muneng tu sakacaay alai tu kalisiw, sisa pisekinan micidek ku nikakelec, u cacudadan miyukiw ci ni daan tu cacay nisulitan tu cudadan u "picidekan nu suni" a cudadan. tawya caypic ku mihcaan ni Fei-mi u Fu-li-ye ku sapikenih nida tu kan-cen-dun a pu-tun kawawan, picudadan pisekingan nida u sayaway. ya Luo-ma tabakiay a cacudadan ci Cu-say-pei. Pi-ta-lei-li u misekingay ci nidaan, milabu ci Fei-mian tu pisekin. ci Pi-ta-lei-li misuayaw ci Fei-mian a nisulitan tu cudadan tada mahemek tu, sakamusa sakalatahudan a Kesye-ciw ci nida sa. 1918年7月, . itini i Pi-sa maudip tu pina a mihcaan, ci Fei-mi atu ci Fuo-lan-ke. La-say-ti milasakapahay nu cabayan ku nuheni tatusa, ci La-say-ti nikudan mala ci Fei-mi nu nikaudipan a sakay syesu nu kakaduman. picudadan ni Fei-mi i Pi-sa a saydan nida u wuli-sye pikinkiwan a sakakaay ci Lu-yi-ci. Pu-cen-ti. ci Pu-cen-ti saan tu ci Fei-mi sakay wulisye nai' ku nipipadang nu makau cu nidaan sa, ci Fei-mi aca ku pakatinengay ci nidaan tu baluhay a sakatineng. ci Fei-mi micidek tu tineng tu lence-wulisye, ci Pu-cen-ti pakunida han nida misakaput tu sakay sasakamuen a kapautan. tina pinaay a mihcaan, ci Fei-mi minanam tu cenlang funsi. uyni susye funsi a kawawan namaka ci Kelei-keli-aw. Lici-ku'e-pase-tuoluo atu Tuli-aw. Leawi-ciwi-ta nipatayni, u sakaetiman kuyniyan a kawawan. kalingatuan ni Fei-ci u susye, sa u wulisye tu. nida a sintuylun, lence lisye atu yunce wulisye tu sakatinengan nuda tu aninanaman. . caysiw tusep mihcaan siwa a bulat, micumud ci Fei-li tu wuli-si. tawya micudaday tatulu ku micudaday, ci Fei-mi, La-say-ti atu ci Nei-luo.Ka-la-la. ci Pucen-ti' pakunida han ku nuheni a mikinkiw tu cancanan a kakakinkiwan. sakamusa ci Fei-mi, mikinkiw ku nuheni tatulu tu X sesin cinti sye, sasingan ku masilacay a law-e'-sin. caysiw tucay mihcaan, ci Fei-mi patahekal tu tusaay a nisulitan tu kesye a cudadan. sakacacay u "pin-tun-cun a tin-he-kun-ti a tunli-sye". nina cudadan micukaymas tu cenlen musakamu tu celean. cenlean hina sasakamuen tu sanwi kitidaan piladladan caay pisengal masumad a wu'-li-lean. 1920年9月, X . itida i Aw-ku-se-te'.ke-pu-fu cudad在 奧古斯特·科普夫著 caysiw tulu mihcaan Yi-ta-li a cudadan, patahekal ci Fei-mi tu sasakamuen, cenen sakalecad tu sakay tademaw taneng makayda i yunce-he miala tu yadahay nu nenleanan. "namakayda i yuncehe" makaala tu kabalihenawan a nenlean taneng picidekan makaadih tina caayay kawmamalahecian a kawawan, caay kaw la'cusay ku mahiniay a kawaw. nikatahekalan caay kaw kapahay nu wulisye cia. .

== N-li-ke. Fei-m 恩里科·費米 == somamad早年 N-li-ke. Fei-mi itida i caysiw sepcay mihcaan siwa a bolat tosiw a mihcaan ni lecohan i Loo-ma. ci ama nida ci A-e-pey-too. Fei-mi o Yi-ta-li no dadan no silamalay a mikowanay, oyna ci Yi-ta. De-cei-ti-se o saydan no molaay. sakatolo no wawaan, o kakana ci Ma-li-ya mikikaka to tosaay a mihcaan, kakama ci Co-li-aw mikikaka ci nidaan to cacay a mihcaan. lecoh sa ko no heni a tatosa malekaka pataydan to i pahabayay ci nidaan. tosaay no pangkiwan taloma ci N-li-ke. Pipalotatengaan no heni o tinsokiw, ci N-li-ke lecohan singlian to ci nida, nika ci nida ato wina wama nida nai' ko tatiedan, sisa to nikaodip nida palotatengan nida o poke-celon. ci N-li-ke ato ci kakama nida malecad ko kanawlan no heni yo wawa henay, malecad ko no heni misangan to mota, misalama to no dingkiay mitiyongay ato no kikay a sasalamaan. caysiw caolim mihcaan, ci Co-li-ya kasibenaan no takolaw pisizicoan a pimacoyan sa mapatay. . itini i Loo-ma a pacakayan to baloan, ci Fai-mi macakay nida ko cacayany a codadan " sosyewoli a codadan" oyniyan no codadan sakawoli a pakatinengay cinidaan. ina codadan to siwa a lasoboan a belihan namaka Yesoho ci An-de-le. Ka-la-fa-senpo i caywal-sipsep mihcaan o latingo a nisolitan. ci Ka-la-fa-senpo o Loo-ma cacodadan a saydan, nina codadan masolit to no tawyaay a katinengan a sasaosian, kotin-lisye, tinwen-sye ,kon-sye at osen-sye a sakatinengan. ci Fai-mi malecaday ko namoh noheni ci N-like. Poo-sike masasongaay ko noheni tatosa. kapot no wama ni Fai-mi mikoli ci A-taw-fo.A-mi-tay-yi paicelang ci Fai-mian minanam to wo'li, napasinobo to cinida to pinaay no woli ato sosya a codadan, oyniyan a codadan tada manamoh to ci Fai-mi. . Pi-sa nikaodip比薩生涯 caysiw caywal mihcaan pito a bolat, Fei-mi mihedek micodad. o sapatideng ato sapasobana a sakapahay, ci A-mi-tay-yi paicelang ci Fei-miyan misinsin to Pi-sa tabakiay a sihanggakoan. adada henay ko baloco' ni laliwan no wawaan caay ka ngadah to cinidaan miliyas to loma' tayda i Pi-sa micodad, mangalay papicodad cinidaan i Loo-ma tabakiay a cacodadan, nika sadikoday mahangen to. cacodadan mangalay pakaytini moneng to sakacaay alai to kalisiw, sisa pisekinan micidek ko nikakelec, o cacodadan miyokiw ci ni daan to cacay nisolitan to codadan o "picidekan no soni" a codadan. tawya caypic ko mihcaan ni Fei-mi o Fo-li-ye ko sapikenih nida to kan-cen-don a po-ton kawawan, picodadan pisekingan nida o sayaway. ya Loo-ma tabakiay a cacodadan ci Co-say-pei. Pi-ta-lei-li o misekingay ci nidaan, milabo ci Fei-mian to pisekin. ci Pi-ta-lei-li misoayaw ci Fei-mian a nisolitan to codadan tada mahemek to, sakamosa sakalatahodan a Kesye-ciw ci nida sa. 1918年7月, . itini i Pi-sa maodip to pina a mihcaan, ci Fei-mi ato ci Foo-lan-ke. La-say-ti milasakapahay no cabayan ko noheni tatosa, ci La-say-ti nikodan mala ci Fei-mi no nikaodipan a sakay syeso no kakadoman. picodadan ni Fei-mi i Pi-sa a saydan nida o woli-sye pikinkiwan a sakakaay ci Lo-yi-ci. Po-cen-ti. ci Po-cen-ti saan to ci Fei-mi sakay wolisye nai' ko nipipadang no makao co nidaan sa, ci Fei-mi aca ko pakatinengay ci nidaan to balohay a sakatineng. ci Fei-mi micidek to tineng to lence-wolisye, ci Po-cen-ti pakonida han nida misakapot to sakay sasakamoen a kapaotan. tina pinaay a mihcaan, ci Fei-mi minanam to cenlang fonsi. oyni sosye fonsi a kawawan namaka ci Kelei-keli-aw. Lici-ko'e-pase-tooloo ato Toli-aw. Leawi-ciwi-ta nipatayni, o sakaetiman koyniyan a kawawan. kalingatoan ni Fei-ci o sosye, sa o wolisye to. nida a sintoylon, lence lisye ato yonce wolisye to sakatinengan noda to aninanaman. . caysiw tosep mihcaan siwa a bolat, micomod ci Fei-li to woli-si. tawya micodaday tatolo ko micodaday, ci Fei-mi, La-say-ti ato ci Nei-loo.Ka-la-la. ci Pocen-ti' pakonida han ko noheni a mikinkiw to cancanan a kakakinkiwan. sakamosa ci Fei-mi, mikinkiw ko noheni tatolo to X sesin cinti sye, sasingan ko masilacay a law-e'-sin. caysiw tocay mihcaan, ci Fei-mi patahekal to tosaay a nisolitan to kesye a codadan. sakacacay o "pin-ton-con a tin-he-kon-ti a tonli-sye". nina codadan micokaymas to cenlen mosakamo to celean. cenlean hina sasakamoen to sanwi kitidaan piladladan caay pisengal masomad a wo'-li-lean. 1920年9月, X . itida i Aw-ko-se-te'.ke-po-fo codad在 奧古斯特·科普夫著 caysiw tolo mihcaan Yi-ta-li a codadan, patahekal ci Fei-mi to sasakamoen, cenen sakalecad to sakay tademaw taneng makayda i yonce-he miala to yadahay no nenleanan. "namakayda i yoncehe" makaala to kabalihenawan a nenlean taneng picidekan makaadih tina caayay kawmamalahecian a kawawan, caay kaw la'cosay ko mahiniay a kawaw. nikatahekalan caay kaw kapahay no wolisye cia. .
